column5: Everfree Shire Ranch is an 11 acre estate offering accommodations for regular Air BnB visitors as well as those who need wide open country spaces. Room 4 has full size bed, office space, TV, closet, video games, and night-stand. Even after all of that it has ample extra space for luggage, boxes, or just stretching your legs. 6 foot high patio deck windows allow for ample natural lighting during the day. Extra guests are welcome so long as you provide your own cot, air mattress, etc.
column8: Room 4 and patio full bed, Horse Friendly Ranch
